description: The table design is very interesting, understandable because it's simple, yet it's complex and challenging? Great for beginners to grasp the idea of pinball. I recommend using the qjoypad keymapper to have gamepad support.
Not bad for a very old game. Only problem is that the screen is too small.

Nice game in english. 
Note: The music can be disabled from game's menu. No full screen mode. Hard to play on Azerty keyboard (because pressing Shift is required for right flipper).
